page.title: 13Farming Special (Part 1)
page.content: All the{farms}within our area are {basically similar}in that they{grow {mostly grass}for hay,silage or grazing for their animals.Some of the farms have{ cattle}for milk & or beef store. Others prefer{sheep.}Some have both. About half of the farmers have{horses keeping them for their children or grand children.Only 1 farmer uses his horse for work.He rides it to round up his animals.{Crops}grown here are mostly to be used as{winter feed}for animals. A few orchards provide{apples for{cider}making in Hereford.None of the farms have{pigs}and only 2 or 3 keep a few{chickens.}1 farmer keeps {ducks}and{geese.}There are no poultry or pig farms in our area. Every farm has 1{dog}or more.One has only{3 legs. Most have{cats}to keep down{vermin. Some farms have no vermin at all,while others have{problems.
